languages.text: Ваш корабль получил доступ к Особой способности! Она может полностью изменить ход сражения — используйте Особую способность, чтобы проверить это! Обратите внимание: за бой можно использовать только одну Особую способность.

Your ship now has access to an ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.
languages.original_text: Ваш корабль получил доступ к Особой способности! Она может полностью изменить ход сражения — используйте Особую способность, чтобы проверить это! Обратите внимание: за бой можно использовать только одну Особую способность.

traits.locale_text: Your ship now has access to an ultimate ability! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

Your ship now has access to an ultimate ability! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

Your ship now has access to an ultimate ability! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

Your ship now has access to an ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

Your ship now has access to an ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

languages.text: ¡Tu nave ahora dispone de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} definitiva! Puede darle la vuelta a la batalla, ¡prueba a usarla y verás! Ten en cuenta que solo puedes usar una capacidad definitiva por combate.
languages.original_text: Your ship now has access to an ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

traits.locale_text: ¡Tu nave ahora dispone de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} definitiva! Puede darle la vuelta a la batalla, ¡prueba a usarla y verás! Ten en cuenta que solo puedes usar una capacidad definitiva por combate.

languages.text: 船が究極{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使えるようになった！戦いの流れを劇的に変える可能性を秘めている。究極アビリティを使って、自分の目で確かめてみよう！ なお、究極アビリティは1回の戦闘につき1度しか使えない。
languages.original_text: Your ship now has access to an ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

traits.locale_text: 船は究極{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使えるようになった！戦いの流れを劇的に変える可能性を秘めている。究極アビリティを使って、自分の目で確かめてみよう！ なお、究極アビリティは1回の戦闘につき1度しか使えない。

languages.text: 您的舰船现在可以使用终极{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}了！终极能力可以立刻扭转战局！您只要亲自试试就知道了！ 请注意，每场战斗中只能使用一种终极能力。
languages.original_text: Your ship now has access to an ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

traits.locale_text: 您的舰船现在可以使用终极{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}了！终极能力可以立刻扭转战局！您只要亲自试试就知道了！ 请注意，每场战斗中只能使用一种终极能力。

languages.text: Dein Schiff hat jetzt Zugang zu einer ultimativen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}! Sie kann den Verlauf der Schlacht drastisch verändern – probiere deine ultimative Fähigkeit aus und überzeuge dich selbst! Beachte, dass du nur eine ultimative Fähigkeit pro Kampf einsetzen kannst.
languages.original_text: Your ship now has access to an ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

traits.locale_text: Dein Schiff hat jetzt Zugang zu einer ultimativen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}! Sie kann den Verlauf der Schlacht drastisch verändern – probiere deine ultimative Fähigkeit aus und überzeuge dich selbst! Beachte, dass du nur eine ultimative Fähigkeit pro Kampf einsetzen kannst.

languages.text: Votre vaisseau a désormais accès à une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ultime qui pourrait bien changer radicalement le cours du combat. Utilisez votre capacité ultime et jugez-en par vous-même ! Notez que vous ne pouvez utiliser qu'une seule capacité ultime par combat.
languages.original_text: Your ship now has access to an ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}! It can drastically change the tide of battle — try using your ultimate ability and see for yourself! Note that you can only use one ultimate ability per combat.

traits.locale_text: Votre vaisseau a désormais accès à une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ultime capable de changer radicalement le cours du combat. Utilisez votre capacité ultime et jugez-en par vous-même ! Notez que vous ne pouvez utiliser qu'une seule capacité ultime par combat.
